articles.title: Loneliness Peaks in Youth and Old Age - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study revealed a U-shaped pattern of loneliness across the lifespan, with higher levels in younger and older adults and the lowest during middle adulthood.

articles.title: Omega-6 Fatty Acid Linked to Lower Bipolar Disorder Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers discovered a link between higher levels of arachidonic acid, an omega-6 fatty acid found in foods like eggs and seafood, and a reduced risk of bipolar disorder.
